translations: adj.更呆板的，更拘谨的；（服装）更整洁的

phrs.translation: 名字, 形容词比较级

sentences.sentence: Fitting bolt with marine grease and wet fitting bolt with primmer studied in the paper are more effective measures.
sentences.translation: 本文研究的船用润滑脂安装螺栓和底漆湿安装螺栓是更有效的措施。

sentences.sentence: Fitting bolt with marine grease and wet fitting bolt with primmer studied in the paper are more effective measures to improve anti environment damage properties of the bolt joints.
sentences.translation: 采用适当的细节防护措施，可提高结构的抗环境损伤性能，疲劳性能一般有不同程度提高。
